intro-main.home-subtitle-1: Revolution and Redemption of Digital Music World

intro-ecosystem.title: THE MUZIKA ECOSYSTEM
intro-ecosystem.subtitle-1: Muzika's core concept is that of an autonomous, self-sustaining ecosystem driven by content creators (music artists) and their fans in tandem. Prior to the advent of blockchain technology in 2009 with the release of Bitcoin, such a revolutionary technology to drive evolution of the music industry remained out of the world's grasp.
intro-ecosystem.subtitle-2: With the creation of a new decentralized digital music ecosystem where anyone can participate in the production, consumption, and distribution cycle of the music industry, Muzika will realize its goal of revolution.

intro-mzk-coins.subtitle-1: Muzika coin(MZK) was deliberately designed as the backbone of this new ecosystem. The team has analyzed both successful and failed cryptocurrencies, past and present, and established a clear vision of what is necessary to make this project a success.
intro-mzk-coins.subtitle-2: MZK will serve as the sole medium of exchange for all economic activity within the ecosystem including trades and sponsorship, all while assisting growth via a few free services targeted at community novices.
intro-mzk-coins.func-1-desc-1: In order to be truly self-sustaining, the Muzika ecosystem will contain all of the necessary activities.
intro-mzk-coins.func-1-desc-2: These range from creative brainstorming, crowd-funding, exchange of feedback, and more.
intro-mzk-coins.func-2-desc-1: Besides community involvement, the ecosystem will also incorporate all of the functions that make the traditional digital music industry otherwise successful.
intro-mzk-coins.func-2-desc-2: Streaming services, a sheet music marketplace, musical instruments, recording services and much more will all be available through Muzika.
intro-mzk-coins.func-3-desc-1: Users may sponsor artists and become their patrons in various ways including regular subscriptions. As patrons, users can enjoy exclusive & sponsor-only products, services,
intro-mzk-coins.func-3-desc-2: and opportunities to be inolved in the creative process of a musical product.
intro-mzk-coins.func-4-desc-1: The real bread and butter of the Muzika ecosystem will be the spirit of creativity.
intro-mzk-coins.func-4-desc-2: Community programs and events such as auditions, contests, crowd-funding drives, live-streaming events, and other such activities driven by member involvement will be a focal point of Muzika.

intro-leadership.subtitle-1: Co-founders are one of the youngest and most successful entrepreneurs in South Korea startup history, averagely aged at 22.
intro-leadership.subtitle-2: All of them were awarded Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia 2018.

intro-business.subtitle: Global No. 1 Instrumental Music Platform
intro-business.highlight-text-1: Unlike hundreds of ICOs without proof of practicality, Muzika is not starting from scratch. The token economy is strongly built on the backs of our existing, profit-generating, and privately & publicly funded business with 2,000,000 active users & subscribers from 150+ nations and artists from 30+ nations.
intro-business.highlight-text-2: Through years of experience, we have learned the precise ways to build a community run by loyal and incentivized individuals: a key to success of any community-based blockchain projects.

intro-roadmap.title: ROADMAP
intro-roadmap.subtitle: Our revolutionary journey has just begun

event.title: Muzika Bounty Program
event.warning-message: The interface above is subject to changes in the official service launch. Muzika team does not guarantee participation or endorsement of the suggested artists in the Muzika platform.

subscribe.desc-2: Make subscription to your favorite artist

like.heart-desc: the artist by clicking on the LIKE button below.
like.step-3-title-2: leave a comment for the artist.

exchange.title: Now convert your LP into MZK!
exchange.lp-desc: LP(Loyalty Point) measures your contribution level to the community, and LPs regularly get exchanged to MZKs.
exchange.lp-desc-2: Your influence on the Muzika ecosystem is proportional to the amount of cumulative LPs.
exchange.wallet-placeholder: Put your Ethereum Wallet Address Here
exchange.wallet-warning-message: If you do not have the wallet address or provide address generated by CRPYTOCURRENCY EXCHAGES, you cannot receive MZK tokens.
exchange.instruction-1: Enter the telegram group (http://t.me/muzika_english) and tell us your receipt code. You CANNOT receive MZKs if you choose not to leave the receipt code in the telegram group.
exchange.instruction-2: MZK tokens will be distributed prior to listing, and schedules will be updated through the telegram group
exchange.instruction-3: Stay connected to us through telegram to receive up-to-date information on the project.
